title: Chromatic Orb
content:
Chromatic Orb Level 1 Evocation Spell 3~24 Damage 3d8 Thunder Hurl a sphere that deals 3~24 Thunder damage and possibly creates a surface on impact. Alternatively, choose a different type of damage. 18m Action Level 1 Spell Slot
